input.sentences: there were a lot of people that showed up to the halloween party yesterday .
we made a lot of dessert for everybody .
some people brought their dogs and dressed them up as well .
some of the decorations were very scary .
i had a great time and i ate a lot of food .
output.sentences: Yesterday the party had a good crowd of people.
There was a lot of dessert at the party.
People were encouraged to bring their dogs dressed in costume.
The party had some scary decorations.
It was a great time with a lot of food.
